mapper.select: select * from tblBank where bank_name like '%' || #{location} || '%'
select count(*) as standby, (count(*)*10) as standbyTime from tblTicketWaitingStatus where bank_seq = #{bankSeq} and work_seq = 100
select count(*) as standby, (count(*)*10) as standbyTime from tblTicketWaitingStatus where bank_seq = #{bankSeq} and work_seq = 200
select count(*) as standby, (count(*)*10) as standbyTime from tblTicketWaitingStatus where bank_seq = #{bankSeq} and work_seq = 300
select count(*) as standby, (count(*)*10) as standbyTime from tblTicketWaitingStatus where bank_seq = #{bankSeq} and work_seq = 400
select * from vwWorkList where bank_seq = #{bankSeq} and work_seq = #{type}
select coalesce(max(ticket_waiting_status_seq), 0) from tblTicketWaitingStatus where bank_seq = #{bankSeq} and work_seq = #{type}
mapper.insert: insert into tblTicketWaitingStatus (ticket_waiting_status_seq, bank_seq, work_seq, member_seq, regdate, time, is_complete) values (nvl((SELECT max(ticket_waiting_status_seq) FROM tblTicketWaitingStatus), 0) + 1, #{bankSeq}, #{type}, 1, default, TO_DATE('9:00', 'HH24:MI'), default)
insert into tblBankFavorite (bank_favorite_seq, bank_seq, member_seq) values (nvl((SELECT max(bank_favorite_seq) FROM tblBankFavorite), 0) + 1, #{bankSeq}, 1)
mapper.select: select count(*) from tblBankFavorite where bank_seq = #{bankSeq} and member_seq = 1
mapper.delete: delete from tblBankFavorite where bank_seq = #{bankSeq} and member_seq = 1
mapper.select: select b.bank_name as bankName, b.bank_seq as bankSeq from tblBank b join tblBankFavorite bf on b.bank_seq = bf.bank_seq where bf.member_seq = #{userSeq}

select b.bank_name as bankName, w.work_name as workName, tws.ticket_waiting_status_seq as ticketWaitingStatusSeq, TO_CHAR(tws.regdate,'YYYY/MM/DD') as regdate, TO_CHAR(tws.regdate,'HH24:MI:SS') as time from tblTicketWaitingStatus tws join tblBank b on b.bank_seq = tws.bank_seq join tblWork w on w.work_seq = tws.work_seq where tws.member_seq = #{userSeq} order by ticketWaitingStatusSeq
